abilities.name: Dragon Fireball Strike
about: Infuses your melee weapon with flame energies as you swing. The stored energy is released from the weapon as projectiles as encounter strikes, flying out to hit farther-away enemies

abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way

abilities.name: Totem Spark
about: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.

abilities.name: Lightning Warp
about: Waits for a duration before teleporting to a targeted destination, with the duration based on the distance and encounter's movement speed. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the encounter was and where they teleported to

abilities.name: Cyclone
about: Damages enemies around encounter, then performs a spinning series of attacks as it travels to a target location
